import { Metadata } from 'next'; import Image from 'next/image'; import { Link } from '@/navigation'; import Button from '@/components/ui/Button'; import { useTranslations } from 'next-intl'; import { getTranslations } from 'next-intl/server'; export async function generateMetadata({ params }: { params: Promise<{ locale: string }> }) { const { locale } = await params; const t = await getTranslations({ locale, namespace: 'AboutPage.metadata' }); return { title: t('title'), description: t('description') }; } export default function AboutPage() { const t = useTranslations('AboutPage'); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{t('hero.title')}

{t('hero.subtitle')}

{/* Mission & Vision */}

{t('mission.title')}

{t('mission.description')}

{t('vision.title')}

{t('vision.description')}

{/* Lawyer Profile */}

{t('counsel.title')}

{t('counsel.subtitle')}

{t('counsel.name')}

{t('counsel.role')}

{t('counsel.background.title')}

{t('counsel.background.description')}

{t('counsel.expertise.title')}

  • {t('counsel.expertise.corporate')}
  • {t('counsel.expertise.litigation')}
  • {t('counsel.expertise.criminal')}
  • {t('counsel.expertise.property')}

{t('counsel.commitment.title')}

{t('counsel.commitment.description')}

{/* Core Values */}

{t('values.title')}

{t('values.subtitle')}

{t('values.integrity.title')}

{t('values.integrity.description')}

{t('values.excellence.title')}

{t('values.excellence.description')}

{t('values.clientFocus.title')}

{t('values.clientFocus.description')}

{t('values.results.title')}

{t('values.results.description')}

{/* Call to Action */}

{t('cta.title')}

{t('cta.subtitle')}

); }

messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

import { Metadata } from 'next'; import { Link } from '@/navigation'; import { useTranslations } from 'next-intl'; import { getTranslations } from 'next-intl/server'; export async function generateMetadata({ params }: { params: Promise<{ locale: string }> }) { const { locale } = await params; const t = await getTranslations({ locale, namespace: 'PrivacyPolicyPage.metadata' }); return { title: t('title'), description: t('description') }; } export default function PrivacyPolicyPage() { const t = useTranslations('PrivacyPolicyPage'); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{t('hero.title')}

{t('hero.date')}

{/* Privacy Policy Content */}

{t('intro')}

{t('sections.s1.title')}

{t('sections.s1.p1')}

  • {t('sections.s1.list1.0')}
  • {t('sections.s1.list1.1')}
  • {t('sections.s1.list1.2')}
  • {t('sections.s1.list1.3')}

{t('sections.s1.p2')}

  • {t('sections.s1.list2.0')}
  • {t('sections.s1.list2.1')}
  • {t('sections.s1.list2.2')}

{t('sections.s2.title')}

{t('sections.s2.p1')}

  • {t('sections.s2.list.0')}
  • {t('sections.s2.list.1')}
  • {t('sections.s2.list.2')}
  • {t('sections.s2.list.3')}
  • {t('sections.s2.list.4')}

{t('sections.s3.title')}

{t('sections.s3.content')}

{t('sections.s4.title')}

{t('sections.s4.p1')}

  • {t('sections.s4.list.0')}
  • {t('sections.s4.list.1')}
  • {t('sections.s4.list.2')}
  • {t('sections.s4.list.3')}

{t('sections.s5.title')}

{t('sections.s5.content')}

{t('sections.s6.title')}

{t('sections.s6.content')}

{t('sections.s7.title')}

{t('sections.s7.p1')}

  • {t('sections.s7.list.0')}
  • {t('sections.s7.list.1')}
  • {t('sections.s7.list.2')}
  • {t('sections.s7.list.3')}
  • {t('sections.s7.list.4')}

{t('sections.s8.title')}

{t('sections.s8.content')}

{t('sections.s9.title')}

{t('sections.s9.content')}

{t('sections.s10.title')}

{t('sections.s10.content')}

{t('sections.s11.title')}

{t('sections.s11.p1')}

{t('sections.s11.info.name')}

{t('sections.s11.info.phone')}+250 788 304 792

{t('sections.s11.info.email')}ishimwehonore450@gmail.com

{t('sections.s11.info.hours')}

{t('footer.title')} {t('footer.content')}

{t('footer.button')}
); }
